title: Storyville 2016 The Toughest Horse Race In The World Palio 720p
description:
The Toughest Horse Race in the World: Palio

History Documentary hosted by Gigi Bruschelli, published by BBC broadcasted as part of BBC Storyville series in 2016 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/c/ca/The-Toughest-Horse-Race-in-the-World-Palio-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Storyville: The Toughest Horse Race in the World: Palio
The Palio is the oldest horse race in the world, and turns the Italian city of Siena into a high-stakes battleground of strategy, intrigue and simmering machismo. In the eye of the storm stand the jockeys - adored if they succeed, despised if they fail. 
This film follows the legendary maestro Gigi Bruschelli, winner of 13 races and master of the intrigues that surround the Palio, and his former protÃ©gÃ© Giovanni Atzeni, a handsome young contender driven by a fearless passion to become number one. It exposes the notoriously closed world of this ancient race and the larger-than-life personalities of those involved in an epic and cinematic tale of Italian life in microcosm.
